thread.section_title: Nerva Boutique Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 5 "Stars" Boutique Hotel
thread.title_full: 5 "Stars" Boutique Hotel - Review of Nerva Boutique Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: EWayC
title: 5 "Stars" Boutique Hotel
text:
The hotel is boutique style and located in the middle of all nearby rome tourist attraction. the location is superb.
The only challenge is our room is located at the back building which requires quite an effort to walk uphill with our big luggage on uneven path.
The hotel front desk is very helpful.
